reporter-output.line: Setting Environment to: PROD
Environment: PROD
Open url 'http://qa5dev.publisher.nbcuni.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Enter 'bba02e5e177644b' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Enter '3f75b182764843f1962c5fd59' in the 'Short Description' text area.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post bba02e5e177644b has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click on the 'Preview Site' link.
Select 'Site as of ...' from the 'SELECT A CONDITION' drop down list.
Enter '02/18/2014' in the 'DATE' text box.
Enter '12:40 pm' in the 'TIME' text box.
Click the 'Enable Preview' button.
Verify the 'Disable Preview' is visible.
Verify the 'Update Preview' button is present.
Click the 'Edit Draft' in the work bench.
Enter 'Updatedbba02e5e177644b' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter 'Updated3f75b182764843f1962c5fd59' in the 'Short Description' text area.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Schedule' in the work bench.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the selected option of the 'SELECT A CONDITION' drop down list is 'Site as of ...'.
Verify the value of the 'DATE' text box is '02/18/2014'.
Verify the value of the 'TIME' text box is '12:40 pm'.
Verify the text 'Updated3f75b182764843f1962c5fd59' is present on the page.
Verify the text '07744465c21541298ddb 94f53da738334c5c8715 ecd023e82af44427ac51 15d796efded94a7abf78' is present on the page.
Click on the 'Preview Site' link.
Verify the 'Disable Preview' is NOT visible.
Click on the 'Preview Site' link.
Verify the 'Disable Preview' is visible.
Verify the selected option of the 'SELECT A CONDITION' drop down list is 'Site as of ...'.
Verify the value of the 'DATE' text box is '02/18/2014'.
Verify the value of the 'TIME' text box is '12:40 pm'.
Click the 'Schedule' in the work bench.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the selected option of the 'SELECT A CONDITION' drop down list is 'Site as of ...'.
Verify the value of the 'DATE' text box is '02/18/2014'.
Verify the value of the 'TIME' text box is '12:40 pm'.
Enter '02/20/2014' in the 'DATE' text box.
Enter '12:40 pm' in the 'TIME' text box.
Click the 'Update Preview' button.
Verify the text 'Updated3f75b182764843f1962c5fd59' is present on the page.
Verify the text '07744465c21541298ddb 94f53da738334c5c8715 ecd023e82af44427ac51 15d796efded94a7abf78' is present on the page.
Click the 'Disable Preview' button.
Click on the 'Preview Site' link.
Verify the selected option of the 'SELECT A CONDITION' drop down list is '- Select -'.
Verify the 'Enable Preview' button is visible.
